property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/128.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

testcase.name: AddemployeeComponent should not display errors for valid name
AddemployeeComponent should display error if name is empty
AddemployeeComponent should display error if name is less than 2 characters
AddemployeeComponent should display error if name is just spaces
AddemployeeComponent should display error if name contains numbers
AddemployeeComponent should display error if name exceeds 100 characters
